description:
Large, Spacious, Luxurious, 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, Sleeps 6 !  My place is close to Times Square, Madison Square Garden, Port Authority, Central Park, Shopping, and Restaurants. You’ll love my place because of The location, the finishes, and the large bedroom and living room. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Guests have access to entire apartment privately. Apartment is on the 2nd floor of a clean mid rise building. Very bright and Sunny in the unit! More photos to come!

All photos are accurate

Full access privately to the apartment.

Please let me know how I can help and give you advice and pointers.

Times square is just a 5 minute walk away! Not too close that it keeps you awake but not too far that you cannot take a quick walk to it. Food, Museums, Bars this location has all that one would need for a visit to New York City.

Subway is 5 minute walk from the apartment and there are taxis available outside your door if needed.

Please be considerate of neighbors.
name: CONDO Times Square Large Luxury
review: Had a fantastic stay in this lovely apartment. Close to everything and would highly recommend this to anyone visiting the city.
